content: **crochet plushie in drops fabel** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no fa-023-by --------------------------------------------------------- **measurements** length approx 40 cm / 15¾ **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio 100 g color no 161 pink dream a remnant color no 100 off-white for eyes a remnant color no 400 black for eyes drops hook size 3 5 mm / us e/4 or size needed to get correct gauge cotton wool for filling
